description: Material Science Engineering major from Atlanta. I'm on Freshman Council, the second coolest organization at Tech.
aspects: I joined Lambda Chi because of the amazing older guys I met. It's been even more amazing than I even thought learning from them and hanging with them. There's no other way on campus to make connections with men older and wiser than yourself. I can't wait to play that role for future members.
interests: Hiking/camping and just generally being outdoors
Reading (when Tech classes ease up enough to give me some free time)
Going to all the awesome restaurants Atlanta has and generally exploring the city
quotes: "What this world needs is bravery, not infallibility."
name: Drew Middleton
